Desc.entry: A large local tenants and residents association covering all ages and various cultures. Organises day trips to the seaside including disabled people and children. Organises bingo 3 times a week, a children's party at Easter, a Christmas shopping trip and Christmas party. Working towards starting a farmers' Christmas market. Also organises a large festival.

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 8
